mainFiles
Class Intensity

java.lang.Object
  mainFiles.Intensity

public class Intensity
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a structure for the analysis of the level of intensity for any given threedimensional accelerationdata based on algorithms provided by Christian Moennig.

Author:
Benjamin Sauer

generateGraph

public void generateGraph(int method,
                          java.lang.String output)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Calculates the intensity of all given files and generates a jFree XY-Series graph depending on the given method.

Parameters:
method - specifies the selected method: 0 being the "Durchschnittsanalyse", 1 being the "Extremwertanalyse"
output - specifies the directory for the output
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
